title: Bug 14943 - Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Bug 14943 - Code Assist does not respect platform line ends.
OB: When creating a new class and adding a method, if a local variable for an array is defined, the code assist feature does not respect the platform line ends.
EB: When creating a new class and adding a method, if a local variable for an array is defined, the code assist feature should respect the platform line ends.
SR: To fix this issue, the code assist feature needs to be modified to properly handle platform line ends when suggesting code completion for local variables in arrays.
